title: 1. Terms of Use
content: The following terms apply specifically to PFControl in addition to all previous terms:

subsections.title: Service Description
subsections.content: PFControl provides air traffic control tools and flight management services for virtual aviation. The service includes flight strip management, airport data access, runway selection, real-time communication features, and integrated voice chat functionality.

subsections.title: Session Management
subsections.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the integrity of their PFControl sessions. Each session is tied to a specific airport and user account. All sessions have a maximum retention period of 30 days from the date of last activity, after which they will be permanently deleted from our systems without prior notice.

subsections.title: Data Security and Encryption
subsections.content: PFControl implements automatic encryption for session chat data. When no users are active in a session, all chat data will be automatically encrypted after a period of inactivity. Chat data is automatically deleted after 7 days from the last activity.

subsections.title: Voice Chat Terms
subsections.content: PFControl's integrated voice chat feature requires modern browser support for WebRTC and stable internet connectivity. Voice chat is intended for air traffic control coordination and aviation-related communication only. Any form of harassment, discriminatory language, or inappropriate content is strictly prohibited and may result in permanent exclusion from all PFConnect services.

subsections.title: PFATC Flight Submission Webhooks
subsections.content: When you submit a flight to a session marked as a PFATC session, information about the flight and the controller will be automatically shared to the PFConnect Discord server through a webhook. This information is publicly viewable by members of the Discord server. By submitting flights to PFATC sessions, you acknowledge and consent to this information being shared publicly.

subsections.title: Statistics Tracking and Leaderboards
subsections.content: PFControl tracks and displays user statistics such as total control time, sessions created, and flights managed. The top users may be displayed on public leaderboards. By using PFControl, you consent to the collection and display of this information for ranking and community engagement purposes.

title: 2. Privacy Policy
content: The following privacy terms apply specifically to PFControl:

subsections.title: Comprehensive Session Data Collection
subsections.content: PFControl collects extensive session data including: (1) All user interactions within sessions, (2) Complete chat message history and communication patterns, (3) Voice chat participation data, connection quality metrics, and usage statistics, (4) IP addresses, device information, and connection logs for all users, (5) Session creation, modification, and deletion activities, (6) All flight strip data and air traffic control actions

subsections.title: Enhanced IP Tracking and Security
subsections.content: PFControl implements comprehensive IP tracking: (1) All IP addresses are logged and monitored for security purposes, (2) IP-based bans and restrictions are enforced across all services, (3) VPN, proxy, and anonymization service usage is prohibited and actively detected, (4) Geolocation data is collected and analyzed for security and compliance purposes, (5) Connection patterns and behavior are monitored for abuse detection

subsections.title: Extended Data Retention
subsections.content: PFControl retains data longer than stated in basic policies: (1) Session data is retained for 30 days minimum, may be retained longer for investigations, (2) Chat data is retained for 7 days minimum, may be retained longer for compliance or security purposes, (3) Security logs and IP tracking data are retained for 12 months minimum, (4) Violation and abuse records are retained indefinitely for enforcement purposes

subsections.title: Voice Chat Data and Monitoring
subsections.content: Voice chat functionality involves comprehensive data collection: (1) Voice participation metadata is collected and stored, (2) Connection quality and technical performance data is monitored, (3) Voice chat abuse and harassment reports are investigated with full data retention, (4) WebRTC connection logs are analyzed for security and performance purposes, (5) Voice chat signaling data is processed and may be stored for service improvement

subsections.title: PFATC Enhanced Data Sharing
subsections.content: PFATC sessions involve additional data sharing: (1) All flight submissions are automatically shared via public webhooks, (2) Controller information and statistics are publicly displayed, (3) Session data may be shared with PFATC partners and community leaders, (4) Enhanced monitoring and logging for PFATC sessions, (5) Public display of controller performance metrics and statistics

subsections.title: Advanced Analytics and Monitoring
subsections.content: PFControl implements advanced analytics: (1) User behavior patterns are analyzed using machine learning algorithms, (2) Performance metrics and statistics are calculated and stored, (3) Session quality and user experience data is collected and analyzed, (4) Predictive analytics are used for service improvement and capacity planning, (5) Cross-platform data correlation with other PFConnect services
